items.sentence: Tom followed the stream for a couple of kilometers.
Tom had a chance to do that, but he decided not to.
Neither Tom nor Mary has decided to move to Boston.
Tom can\'t forgive himself for what he did to Mary.
Tom can\'t get the bottle open. Could you help him?
Tom can\'t go out because he has a lot of homework.
Tom planned a surprise birthday party for his wife.
Tom often eats popcorn when he\'s watching a movie.
What is Tom doing here? I thought he was in Europe.
Tom is sure that Mary will be at the party tonight.
